review: I bought the Stick because I could not get cc on Netflix with the app built into my TV. Fire Stick enabled this, which was great. Moreover reception is hi-res, good bandwidth. (I'm lucky my router is right next to TV.) Interface is decent, the small remote adequate though improvable. I'm very happy the Stick solved my Netflix cc problem. Now wife and I can get all the dialog. Another point: only $39. That's good.
author: Sherab K

review: This thing is GREAT with Amazon prime. If times get tough, I could cut all my HBO, Showtime & cable bill entirely and just use this (although you'd be playing catch up with some seasons and prime doesn't offer ALL shows and networks). Streams clean and was easy to install. You DO have access to other services (HULU, ect), however, the more services you use, the more you'll pay (monthly). Kinda like a la carte viewing. Nice alternative to Cable and/or satellite TV, and an inexpensive way to experiment with "cutting the cord".  I'm not there YET....but certainly headed in that direction. p.s. you DO need a wireless broadband network in place to use this product. I assumed everyone has a wireless network, and you know what they say about assuming!
author: Amazon Guy
